summary: A small overhaul of Castle Volkihar's docks & eastern tower.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][u][font=Courier New]Castle Volkihar Docks Overhaul[/font][/u][/center][/size][center]
Adds statues, furniture and other static objects to the docks & eastern tower of Castle Volkihar. 
I did not edit any other areas of the castle as they are all rebuildable in the mod mentioned below, I highly recommend using it with this mod.
The East Tower is rebuildable in that mod too, but remains largely empty, so I changed that.
The docks were completely unchangeable, so I changed that.[/center]
[center]
[b]Perfect for usage with the 'Castle Volkihar Rebuilt" mod by [i]Arthmoor[/i].[/b]
[https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65502][/center]
[size=3]

INTENDED FOR USE AFTER THE DAWNGUARD MAIN QUEST IS COMPLETED
If you use this mod during the quest and it breaks your game, that's your own fault. I warned you.[/size]

[font=Courier New][size=5][u]Includes:[/u][/size][/font]
[b][font=Courier New][size=4]Docks - [/size][/font][/b]
[size=3]- Throne & Dining Table[/size]
[size=3]- Soul Cairn Crystals[/size]
[size=3]- Gargoyle statues[/size]
[size=3]- Large ship[/size]
[size=4][b][font=Courier New]Eastern Tower -[/font]
[/b][/size][size=3]- Shrines of the 8 original divines (Talos not included as the Castle was built long before Talos' divinity)
[/size][size=3]- Shrine of Auriel
- Shrine to the 3 Daedra: Azura, Mephala, & Boethiah

[/size][font=Courier New][size=5][u]Compatibility:
[/u][/size][/font][size=3]Fully compatible with any mod that [b]does not[/b] edit the following rooms/areas:
[/size]- Volkihar Docks
- Castle Volkihar East Tower

[size=3]The following rooms/areas of the castle are unaffected by this mod:[/size]
[size=2]- Undercroft
- Ruins
- North Tower
- Courtyard
- Cathedral
- Keep
- Balcony[/size]
[u]
[/u][u][font=Courier New][size=5]Future Plans:[/size][/font][/u]
[size=3]- Add an interior to the boat.
- Edit the tower at the front of the castle[/size]
author: User_26414704
